Items.Title: Oversight - Threats to Jamaica Bay: A Case Study of Flooding and Sea Level Rise in New York City.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Threats to Jamaica Bay: A Case Study of Flooding and Sea Level Rise in New York City.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring a map of areas in the city most vulnerable to increased flooding in the future and a plan to address such flooding
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring a map of areas in the city most vulnerable to increased flooding in the future and a plan to address such flooding.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to creation of a New York City Jamaica Bay task force, which would provide advice and recommendations to the city with respect to the Jamaica Bay clean-up and resiliency project.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Creation of a NYC Jamaica Bay task force.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to developing a pilot program in southeastern Queens County to use dewatering discharge as a means of heating and cooling buildings
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Developing a pilot program in southeastern Queens County to use dewatering discharge as a means of heating and cooling buildings.

Items.Title: Oversight - Threats to Jamaica Bay: A Case Study of Flooding and Sea Level Rise in New York City.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Threats to Jamaica Bay: A Case Study of Flooding and Sea Level Rise in New York City.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring a map of areas in the city most vulnerable to increased flooding in the future and a plan to address such flooding
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to developing a pilot program in southeastern Queens County to use dewatering discharge as a means of heating and cooling buildings
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Developing a pilot program in southeastern Queens County to use dewatering discharge as a means of heating and cooling buildings.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to creation of a New York City Jamaica Bay task force, which would provide advice and recommendations to the city with respect to the Jamaica Bay clean-up and resiliency project.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Creation of a NYC Jamaica Bay task force.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Van Bramer and Adams
